attributes.action: Instruct the Dept. of Work and Pensions to review the rules on claims for Winter Fuel allowance for OAP's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like the Prime Minister to instruct the Department of Work and Pensions to review the rules for claims on Winter Fuel allowance for OAP's. It would appear that there are currently no rules of discretion being applied to claims of exceptional circumstances. This is forcing OAP's into hardship and poverty.
